TopicTitle: Need a name for a Game

Articles.Content: Need a name for the game i'm developing in java eclipse. Any suggestions? i will pick what i think are the best ones and i'll set up a poll for you guys to vote on. games website is: http://the-space-game.webs.com/

How about "KSP+"? Really, more parts than KSP? Not to be sarcastic or anything, but you'll need more information than those few lines you threw together on that page... how about some screenshots or even concept artwork? That would go a long way.

How about "KSP+"? Really, more parts than KSP? Not to be sarcastic or anything, but you'll need more information than those few lines you threw together on that page... how about some screenshots or even concept artwork? That would go a long way.

Concept Art on site

universal space ultimate. Change this name as much as you feel. just write (name by alex theiss) in the credits or something.

if you use it. please do. It'd make my year.

- - - Updated - - -

or space explorer. or galactic conquest. universal pioneers. Space Settlers. The Space Game is simple but good. I'd play that. I's entirely your call. Just remember, the president is just a suggester to laws.

- - - Updated - - -

Even more:

solar oddessy. planetary voyagers. Galactic Sanbox.
What about something more imaginetive like Millenium's Edge or Milky dreams.

What about something more imaginetive like Millenium's Edge or Milky dreams.

it's going to be sandbox Simulation game

And? Aren't these names good?

yes very good i think i'll do a poll but how?
